citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45 am on
24-May-19.
Spoke to Mrs. Lapp at the facility. She said Mr. Lapp was away for the day and wouldn't be back until evening.
When asked about a change in the optimal hours, she mentioned they were considering cancelling the license.

narrative:

When asked about a change in the optimal hours, she mentioned they were considering cancelling the license.
